name: Mimikyu's HOTEL full game! (version 1.1)
description:
(PLEASE READ THE STORY BEFORE YOU PLAY THE GAME)

story:

once apon a time a man wanted to get a job at the best 4.5 star hotel on the city. what didnt he know is that the manager was mimikyu that is 10 years old and he owned the hotel. mimikyu is a little angry when someone is doing wrong the math that he gives. the math is a part of the aplication that you need to do so you are 100% a person that got to school. so he got the aplications and left. it was pretty hard tho. mimikyu, jude, ethan, ally,  roboty,  jhon and other of his friends  were after him. and as a matter of fact that guy was you. play the game to understand what did he do to escape. so what are you wating for, so get startin'!

characters:

mimikyu-baldi

jude-playtime

ethan-principal

ally-arts and crafters

jhon-gotta sweep

roboty-1st prize

mimipuppet-bully
